42: print("\"Hello. Can I help you with something?\"\n")
print("\"Well, what can I help you with?\"")
print("\"I'm not allowed to give out that information.\"")
print("\"I am one of Lord British's elite guards. We keep @order throughout @Britannia.\"")
print("\"Hail Lord British! Hail Britannia! Hail the glorious Avatar!\"")
print("\"Lately our ranks have thinned. Many have been lost in the war against the @gargoyles.\"")
print("\"Few of us are left to @patrol the cities, and those may be sent to the shrines soon.\"\n*\n\"I fear we may @lose this war.\"")
print("\"Not a single shrine have we liberated. The gargoyles fight like @daemons!\"")
print("\"I have noticed a certain resemblance...\"")
print("\"That is our only job, in times of @peace.\"")
print("\"May we see such times again!\"")
print("\"If that is all, then I'll be back about my duties.\"\n")
print("\"Perhaps you should ask somebody else.\"")
